sentences.english: Objective To isolate and purify high-purity neohesperidin from Fructus Aurantii extract.
sentences.chinese: 目的从枳壳提取物中分离纯化高纯度新橙皮苷。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish the chemical pattern recognition method for the quality control of Fructus aurantii.
sentences.chinese: 目的初步建立中药枳壳质量控制的模式识别方法方法。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo establish a microwave-assisted extraction (MAE) method for the extraction of the naringin in Fructus Aurantii.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立乙醇微波辅助萃取枳壳中柚皮苷的提取方法。

sentences.english: Results Rhizoma atractylodis macrocephalae and Fructus Aurantii were identified by the TLC.
sentences.chinese: 结果薄层色谱法可以鉴别出白术和枳壳。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Above mentioned characters are obvious and can be used for the identification of Fructus Poncirus Trifliate.
sentences.chinese: 结论上述特征明显，可用于绿衣枳壳的鉴定。

sentences.english: Made from the extract of citrus aurantium, aka "Bitter Orange".
sentences.chinese: 从枳壳中的提取液，又称“苦橙”。

sentences.english: Methods The volatile oil was obtained from PPFA by steam distillation.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用水蒸气蒸馏法从枳壳中提取挥发油。

sentences.english: To explore the effect and advantage of Bupleurum Citrus Aurtantium Liqi Decoction from Laos Trauma Section on chest sprain.
sentences.chinese: 探讨柴胡枳壳理气汤对治疗胸胁挫伤的疗效及优势。

sentences.english: Objective To screen out good strains for Jiangxi Fructus Aurantii.
sentences.chinese: 目的筛选地道药材“江枳壳”优良类型。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a RP-HPLC method for the determination of naringin and neohesperidin in Fructus Aurantii.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立枳壳中柚皮苷和新橙皮苷含量测定的方法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To identify Fructus Poncirus Trifliate.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察绿衣枳壳的显微鉴别。

definition: dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
Amomom (fructus Amomi), plant used in Chinese medicine
the root bark of the peony tree
husk of betel nut 檳榔|槟榔[bing1 lang5]
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
